ygData.subject: Re: Twinking
ygData.msgSnippet: I have been playing EQ casually for over 2 years. I spent the first year and a half trying to find the right character for me. finally, I decided to
ygData.messageBody:
I have been playing EQ casually for over 2 years.
I spent the first year and a half trying to find
the right character for me. finally, I decided to
consolidate all of the items my characters had on to one
character per server. Am I to feel guilty about pooling all
of the plat and items I have earned in my limited
playing time, so that my chosen characters can play a
little easier? Would my example be an
exception?<br><br>I say if you have the means and the desire to twink
then go with it. I would much rather deal with a twink
over a noobie beggar any day.<br><br>just my
2cp.<br><br>Roby lvl 16 (semi twinked) Monk on Brell<br>Brannon
lvl 15 (naked poor and rarely played) Shaman on
Morell Thule.
